overview: It's not just the British army that has its fair share of hot and horny butt-raiders รฐ seems like there's plenty of the same ilk in this Latin-based escapade, where a bunch of over-sexed dudes take time to get to their military colleagues better. And we mean much better! No negligent mischarges here, boys. The weapons in hand are all loaded and ready to fire, which we can assure that they do. Big time! All resulting in a hot, sticky jizz-stained soaking for every recruit around!
title: Spanish Army Sluts
